issue.title: [Python][Parquet] Statistics for uint64 columns may overflow
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5166](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5166). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
See the attached parquet file, where the statistics max value is smaller than the min value.

You can roundtrip that file through pandas and store it back to provoke the same bug.
